title: Navigating the energy transition: Identifying critical success factors for ancillary services provision and sustainable energy solutions in Germany
content:
Publication date: 15 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 5

Author(s): Jana Gerlach, Vanessa Beutel, Carsten Wegkamp, Michael H. Breitner, Stefan Geißendörfer, Bernd Engel, Karsten von Maydell
